title: Jump Over
subtle: Concept (fiction), 32 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR110L
description: In the book Jump Over, students will read about animals that jump over objects in their path. Students will have the opportunity to sequence events in this simple, repetitive story. Detailed, supportive illustrations and the high-frequency word the support early readers.
meta: cat, cow, deer, fox, girl, goat, horse, jumps, over
Use the reading strategy of connecting to prior knowledge to understand text
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /d/ sound
Capitalization and Punctuation : Recognize and use capital letters and periods
High-Frequency Words : Recognize and use high-frequency word the
